name: SLVRY
description: Money leads us to helpless soul.  Most people are slaves to jobs they do not like because they need the money.  There is tremendous corruption,greed,crime,embezzlement, anda more cause by the need for money.  Capitalism = Monetary System.  The use of money result in social stratifaction and elitism based primarily on economic disparity.  We can't solve any problem if we still stuck in the same system. Bigger problems will arise when we are faced with new technologies.
